author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Updated Geometry tag in `mcRun3` GTs to add minor corrections to the old DD detector geometry for 12_0, as requested by @cvuosalo in [this post on the AlCaDB HN](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4406.html).

GT diffs:

**2021 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun3_2021_design_v8/120X_mcRun3_2021_design_v1

**2021 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v10/120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v1

**2021 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v9/120X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v1

**2021 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v8/120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v1

**2023 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v8/120X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v1

**2024 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v8/120X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v1

#### PR validation:
Tested with: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited,7.23,159.0,12034.0,12834.0 --ibeos -j 9`

#### Backport:
No backport needed, this is intended for 12_0_X only.
title: Update Geometry tag for 12_0
